          <title>
            <string language="et">Kevadlilled</string>
            <string language="en">Spring flowers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frühling Blumen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fleurs de ressort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Flores da mola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fiori della molla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λουλούδια άνοιξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flores del resorte</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">PowerPointi esitlus kevadlilledest. On esitatud 12 luuletust kevadlilledest, neist kümnele on lisatud ka fotod.</string>
            <string language="en">PowerPoint presentation about spring flowers. There are 12 poems about spring flowers, 10 of them are illustrated with photos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Keel ja kõne</string>
            <string language="et">Kuulamine ja kõnelemine</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Listening and Talking</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PowerPoint Darstellung über Frühling Blumen. 
Es gibt 12 Gedichte über Frühling Blumen, 10 von ihnen werden 
veranschaulicht mit Fotos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de PowerPoint au sujet des fleurs de 
ressort. Il y a 12 poésies au sujet des fleurs de ressort, 10 
d'entre elles sont illustrés avec des photos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação de PowerPoint sobre flores da mola.
Há 12 poemas sobre as flores da mola, 10 delas é ilustrado com
fotos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione del PowerPoint circa i fiori della 
molla. Ci sono 12 poems circa i fiori della molla, 10 di loro 
sono illustrati con le foto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PowerPoint παρουσίαση για τα λουλούδια άνοιξη. 
Υπάρχουν 12 ποιήματα για τα λουλούδια άνοιξη, 10 τους 
είναι διευκρινισμένα με τις φωτογραφίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de PowerPoint sobre las flores del 
resorte. Hay 12 poemas sobre las flores del resorte, 10 de ellas
se ilustra con las fotos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
